mobile.name: goat mountain
mobile.long_description: A mountain goat nibbles at a piece of grass here.
mobile.description: This goat is acclimated to the rugged terrain of the mountains. It looks at you and shies away a little.

mobile.name: demon decay
mobile.long_description: A cloaked and clawed demon of decay comes at you viciously!
mobile.description: This demon has pure malevolence for anything living. Oops! You're living! I guess that means you!

mobile.name: book monster guardian
mobile.long_description: A mound of books rise up into a human shape and tries to hit you!
mobile.description: Ironically enough, the book-monster's head is War and Peace. Hmm.

mobile.name: bad feeling
mobile.long_description: A bad feeling chokes your throat.
mobile.description: It resembles a lot of other bad feelings you've had, but a lot more tangible... magic?

mobile.name: nightmare
mobile.long_description: Your worst nightmare coalesces in front of you and attacks!
mobile.description: It looks like you deepest, darkest fears personified. Wait a minute! It IS your deepest, darkest fears personified!

mobile.name: guardian
mobile.long_description: A guardian guards the door. It looks at you and attacks!
mobile.description: The guardian guards the door. That's about all its brain can handle: guarding.
